product_description: A gathered neckline and tiers give lovely flow to this soft cotton jersey dress that shifts from day to night with a simple switch of accessories.
product_details_and_care:
A gathered neckline and tiers give lovely flow to this soft cotton jersey dress that shifts from day to night with a simple switch of accessories. The adjustable straps ensure a perfect fit.
40" center front length
Slips on over head
Scoop neck
Adjustable straps
Tiered skirt
Unlined
95% cotton, 5% elastane
Hand wash, dry flat
Imported
Item #6086248
